file.name: John
file.cert: Masters in Business from BYU Business College
file.bio: Founder of Salmon River Adventures. I have helped run many business and wanted to start a company of my own.

file.name: Sara
file.cert: Bachlors in Business from Ross School of Business
file.bio: I have always loved Business and I have worked hard to learn other peopls vision. I hope to one day own my very own buisness.

file.name: Neal
file.bio: I have worked with John for many years and so when he told me he was going to start his own business I just had to join in.
